note:
AuDHD trans woman. Animist and anarchist. Trying to make friends or find community despite low social battery. My dream is to retreat from society, become a steward of the land I live on, and live in companionship with chickens.

Major interests: Birds, linguistics, ecology, taxonomy, permaculture, psychology, animist/pagan spirituality, video games (Souls games, Metroid, Fire Emblem, Hollow Knight, Pikmin, to name a few), piano, writing.

name: Bioregion
value: Southeast Savannas and Riparian Forests of North America (NA25)
